metadata.name: Weight Of Shadows
metadata.description:
In this artwork titled the artist explores the concept of the weight of shadows within a minimalistic café setting. The illustration showcases the seamless integration of day and night animation, symbolising the delicate equilibrium between light and darkness that exists within our lives.

The artwork features a serene café scene with clean lines and a minimalist design aesthetic. The café, depicted in warm tones of orange, exudes an inviting and cozy atmosphere. The clever use of negative space and the absence of excessive details create a sense of calmness and tranquility.
